version_description:
- 3 new tables: WHITE WATER™, RED AND TED'S ROAD SHOW™, and HURRICANE™.
Challenge notification in Main Menu
- The number of active challenges are now displayed on the Main Menu button.
New Challenge screen
- Challenge screen got an upgrade to give clear information about challenge objectives, difficulty, and target score.
New Challenge functions
- Easier to reset and unlock new challenges.
Shop rearrangement
- Owned tables are no longer displayed in the shop.

Two scarily authentic classics! MONSTER BASH™ & CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON.

- Major bug fixes and performance improvements on all tables
- Push notifications can be turned on to inform about challenges
- Stability improvements
- UI improvements
- Minor bugfixes

- UI improvements
- Stability improvements
- Minor bugfixes
Three classic tables! FUNHOUSE™ (starring Rudy, the iconic dummy antagonist), SPACE STATION™, and DR. DUDE AND HIS EXCELLENT RAY™.

- Improved stability by fixing potential crash issues across the app.
- Addressed an issue that may have resulted in loss of progress where players did not sign in to Game Center. Please contact our support team for recovery if you are affected.
